sqlMap.select: SELECT ' ' AS CLASS_CODE, ' ' AS CLASS_NAME, '전체' AS CODE_FULL_NAME FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT CLASS_CODE, CLASS_NAME, CLASS_NAME || ' / ' || CLASS_CODE || '(' || USE_YN || ')' AS CODE_FULL_NAME FROM CMM_CODE WHERE PARENT_CODE IS NULL

SELECT '' AS CLASS_CODE, '미지정(최상위코드)' AS CODE_FULL_NAME FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT CLASS_CODE, SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(CLASS_NAME, '|') AS CODE_FULL_NAME FROM CMM_CODE START WITH PARENT_CODE IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR CLASS_CODE = PARENT_CODE

SELECT ROWNUM, T1.* FROM ( SELECT SUBSTR(CLASS_CODE, -3) AS CLASS_CODE, CLASS_NAME, USE_YN, MAIN_TABLE, CLASS_DESC, SORT_SEQ, REGIST_TIME, REGIST_NAME, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_NAME, PARENT_CODE, SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(CLASS_NAME, '|') AS CODE_FULL_NAME, LEVEL FROM CMM_CODE
WHERE CLASS_NAME LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
START WITH PARENT_CODE IS NULL
CLASS_CODE LIKE '%' || #searchCondition# || '%'
CONNECT BY PRIOR CLASS_CODE = PARENT_CODE ORDER SIBLINGS BY SORT_SEQ) T1
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO CMM_CODE ( CLASS_CODE, CLASS_NAME, USE_YN, MAIN_TABLE, CLASS_DESC, SORT_SEQ, REGIST_TIME, REGIST_NAME, PARENT_CODE ) VALUES ( #parentCode# || #classCode#, #className#, #useYn#, #mainTable#, #classDesc#, #sortSeq#, SYSDATE, #registName#, #parentCode# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE CMM_CODE SET CLASS_NAME = #cmmCodeVO.className#, USE_YN = #cmmCodeVO.useYn#, MAIN_TABLE = #cmmCodeVO.mainTable#, CLASS_DESC = #cmmCodeVO.classDesc#, SORT_SEQ = #cmmCodeVO.sortSeq#, UPDATE_TIME = SYSDATE, UPDATE_NAME = #updateId# WHERE CLASS_CODE = #cmmCodeVO.parentCode# || #cmmCodeVO.classCode#
